urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Stopover
urls.description: Explore Bahrain Passengers travelling with us can now book their stopover package in Bahrain through our website and for exclusive rates.   You can spend up to 4 nights’ in the Kingdom of Bahrain - on your way to your final destination or your way back home. Select any of our stay packages customised for your travel style. All our packages include hotel accommodation, daily breakfast, airport transfer and more!   Discover the Kingdom of Bahrain by booking any one of our exclusive packages during your booking process on gulfair.com in just 4 easy steps - complete with flight, hotel, tours and no visa fees!   Check your eligibility by visiting Bahrain eVisa System  Book your trip on our website Choose when you want to stopover and how many nights Select your flights and preferred package!   * Terms and conditions apply. Packages can only be booked by passengers who are eligible to receive a visa on arrival in the Kingdom of Bahrain. To read more, visit Bahrain Stopover Packages Booking C

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

data.text:
@2021Sami وعليكم السلام ورحمة الله وبركاته،
نرجوا منك التواصل مع مركز الاتصالات العالمي و تزويدهم برقم الحجز للمساعدة. أرقام التواصل في الصفحة التالية:
https://t.co/IZ90wPwM06
شكراً

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

data.text:
@shabazn4 On behalf of Gulf Air,
We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
However, the same has been forwarded as a reminder to the concerned department for action.
Once notified, we will revert back to you at the earliest.
Thank you!

@shabazn4 Dear shabaz n,
We apologize for the inconvenience.
Please submit your feedback on the Feedback and Query section on our website https://t.co/OPaSZqfJ3U
A representative of our Customer Care team will look at your case and contact you soon.
Thank you

مع رحلتين في اليوم إلى لندن؛ يمكنك أن تحجز عطلة ميسّرة لتستمتع بإجازة قصيرة أو رحلة عمل سريعة. كما أنه الآن قد تم تطبيق نظام التأشيرات الإلكتروني لمواطني دول مجلس التعاون المسافرين إلى المملكة المتحدة.
احجز تذاكرك إلى لندن على https://t.co/Vjb5AqIn5i
